properties.entry: UPDATE profile SET "PROFILE"='n', INTRODUCTION=?, SNS=?, INTEREST=? WHERE user_id = ?
SELECT USER_ID, "PROFILE", INTRODUCTION, FEED_STATUS, SOCIALING, SNS, INTEREST, LIKE_SOCIALING FROM profile WHERE FEED_STATUS='N' AND user_id=?
INSERT INTO PROFILE_FILE ( FILE_NO, ROUTE, USER_ID, ORIGIN_NAME, CHANGE_NAME, STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_FILE_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? , DEFAULT )
